content.title: Young Innovators Program
content.details: Innovation may be defined as exploiting new ideas leading to the creation of a new product, process or service. It is not just the invention of a new idea that is important. It is actually 'bringing it to market', putting into practice and exploiting it in a manner that leads to new products, services or systems that add value or improve quality. It possibly involves technological transformation and management restructuring. Innovation also means exploiting modern technology and employing out-of-the-box thinking to generate new value and to bring about significant changes in society. Mission Youth under this program aims to enhance young people’s learning and development through a range of non-formal learning activities with focus on pioneers experimentation and innovation in education, entrepreneurship, art, research and cross-sectoral partnerships.
benefits: The total amount of assistance provided under this scheme shall be subject to a maximum limit of ₹5,00,000/-
One person can seek the assistance under this scheme only once for a particular innovation.
eligibility: Applicant must be between the 18-35 years age group.
Applicant must be passed the 10th standard or above (with possible relaxations).
Innovative and creative endeavors in art, skills, crafts, literature, research, and science.
documents_required: Financial Justification and Stage wise funding requirement.

faqs.question: What is 'Young Innovators Program'?
faqs.answer: The Young Innovators Program by Mission Youth, J&K aims to ignite a fire of innovation among the youth of Jammu and Kashmir. It goes beyond just encouraging creative ideas; it actively empowers them to bring those ideas to life.

faqs.question: What benefits are provided?
faqs.answer: Financial Assistance will provided for the innovative ideas.

faqs.question: What educational qualifications are required?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be passed the 10th standard or above. Notable degree of creativity in the fields relevant field.

faqs.question: How many creative fields are covered?
faqs.answer: Six innovative creative fields are covered: Art, Skills, Crafts, Literature, Research, and Science.

faqs.question: Which age group can avail the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be between the 18-35 years age group.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant have to visit the official website and fill out the online application form.

faqs.question: What is the URL of the official portal?
What documents are required?
faqs.answer: 1. Financial Justification and Stage wise funding requirement. 2. Applicant Photograph. 3. Birth Certificate of Applicant. 4. Domicile Certificate. 5. Qualification Certificate. 6. Applicant Signature.

sources.type: Financial Justification And Stage Wise Funding Requirement
